title: Israeli journalist raises a toast on air on Hassan Nasrallah's death. Video viral
content: According to a report, Segal asked 'who's drinking?' as he raised the toast. His fellow panelist Ben Caspit said he would but former Israeli military chief spokesperson Ronen Manelis apparently refused. “Really, everyone is happy that Nasrallah is dead,” Manelis said, as reported by New York Post. “[But] let’s think about the residents who had to flee their homes [due to the rocket bombardments].”​
summary: According to a report, Segal asked 'who's drinking?' as he raised the toast. His fellow panelist Ben Caspit said he would but former Israeli military chief spokesperson Ronen Manelis apparently refused. “Really, everyone is happy that Nasrallah is dead,” Manelis said, as reported by New York Post. “[But] let’s think about the residents who had to flee their homes [due to the rocket bombardments].”​

title: UK shuts down its last coal power station
content: Britain has shut down its last coal-fired power station, marking an end to 142 years of coal reliance. The Ratcliffe-on-Soar plant ceased operations, symbolizing the UK's significant progress towards a cleaner energy future. The country has seen substantial growth in renewable energy, with coal now contributing a mere 1.8% to its electricity mix.
summary: Britain has shut down its last coal-fired power station, marking an end to 142 years of coal reliance. The Ratcliffe-on-Soar plant ceased operations, symbolizing the UK's significant progress towards a cleaner energy future. The country has seen substantial growth in renewable energy, with coal now contributing a mere 1.8% to its electricity mix.

title: 'Those numbers could...': MSNBC guest warns about Latino voter trends affecting Kamala Harris
content: Maria Hinojosa expressed on MSNBC that many Latino voters may be shifting toward the Republican Party, identifying with White Americans. She noted Kamala Harris' declining lead among Latino voters, warning that this trend could pose challenges for Harris in the upcoming election.
summary: Maria Hinojosa expressed on MSNBC that many Latino voters may be shifting toward the Republican Party, identifying with White Americans. She noted Kamala Harris' declining lead among Latino voters, warning that this trend could pose challenges for Harris in the upcoming election.

title: VP debate between JD Vance and Tim Walz: 10 things to know
content: JD Vance versus Tim Walz is a high-stake debate because they have attacked and counter-attacked each other on several issues including what JD Vance called Tim Walz's 'stolen record'. JD Vance is a confident orator, debater and Tim Walz is reportedly anxious ahead of the debate fearing that he would let down Kamala Harris. But Walz's advantage is the political fumbles that the GOP made and many of them are credited to JD including the recent rumor of Haitians eating pets.
summary: JD Vance versus Tim Walz is a high-stake debate because they have attacked and counter-attacked each other on several issues including what JD Vance called Tim Walz's 'stolen record'. JD Vance is a confident orator, debater and Tim Walz is reportedly anxious ahead of the debate fearing that he would let down Kamala Harris. title: Verizon service outage strands thousands of users in 'SOS' mode across US
content: Verizon faced major outages affecting thousands of users in cities including Chicago and Indianapolis on Monday. Issues began around 9.30am ET and caused over 66,000 outage reports by midday. Verizon is working to resolve it. Meanwhile, AT&T had fewer reports and claims no nationwide issue. Verizon recently announced a $3.3 billion mobile towers deal.
summary: Verizon faced major outages affecting thousands of users in cities including Chicago and Indianapolis on Monday. Issues began around 9.30am ET and caused over 66,000 outage reports by midday. Verizon is working to resolve it. Meanwhile, AT&T had fewer reports and claims no nationwide issue. Verizon recently announced a $3.3 billion mobile towers deal.

title: British woman reveals harrowing childhood abuse in Osho’s 'sex cult'
content: A British woman detailed the sexual abuse she endured from the age of six within Osho's Sannyasin communities. She described being exposed to and participating in sexual acts as a child. The upcoming documentary 'Children of the Cult' explores such abuse within these communities.
summary: A British woman detailed the sexual abuse she endured from the age of six within Osho's Sannyasin communities. She described being exposed to and participating in sexual acts as a child. The upcoming documentary 'Children of the Cult' explores such abuse within these communities.

title: 'Batsh*t crazy': Donald Trump's son comments on Mark Cuban's warning to Elon Musk
content: ​Donald Trump Jr took a swipe at Mark Cuban and said Mark Cuban and the Left are so corrupt that they literally expect favors. "At least we now know why he's taking these bats**t crazy positions. Thanks for clarifying for everyone!" Trump Jr wrote in response to Mark Cuban's words of caution for Elon Musk that Donald Trump's loyalty lies only for himself.

"At least we now know why he's taking these bats**t crazy positions. Thanks for clarifying for everyone!" title: Man accused of attempting to assassinate Trump at Florida golf course pleads not guilty
content: Ryan Routh, accused of attempting to assassinate former US President Donald Trump, pleaded not guilty to five federal charges. An agent spotted Routh's rifle at Trump's Florida golf course, preventing the attack. Routh fled and was later apprehended. Evidence includes a note offering $150,000 for Trump's assassination. No shots were fired, and Trump was unhurt.
summary: Ryan Routh, accused of attempting to assassinate former US President Donald Trump, pleaded not guilty to five federal charges. An agent spotted Routh's rifle at Trump's Florida golf course, preventing the attack. Routh fled and was later apprehended. Evidence includes a note offering $150,000 for Trump's assassination. No shots were fired, and Trump was unhurt.

title: 'Crooked and obscene': Donald Trump's naked statue is back. Who makes these installations?
content: ​The 43-ft statue will now tour across the United States as part of the "Crooked and Obscene Tour". The tour organizers not named by the Wrap said portraying Trump in the nude is "intentional, serving as a bold statement on transparency, vulnerability and the public personas of political figures". "They also aim to spark conversation about “transparency—or lack thereof—in politics, challenging viewers to think critically about political influence,” according to the organizers.
summary: ​The 43-ft statue will now tour across the United States as part of the "Crooked and Obscene Tour". The tour organizers not named by the Wrap said portraying Trump in the nude is "intentional, serving as a bold statement on transparency, vulnerability and the public personas of political figures". "They also aim to spark conversation about “transparency—or lack thereof—in politics, challenging viewers to think critically about political influence,” according to the organizers.

title: Kamala Harris' husband called 'wife guy'. MAGA supporters remind he cheated on first wife
content: " To me it's the right thing to do -- support women -- it's mutual with Kamala, we support each other, we have each other's back. I have said many times that when we lift up women whether it's pay equity, childcare, family leave and all these issues...women should not have less rights. That's not the American way. It's also not like that if some women succeed, some dudes there are suffering. It's not one-to-one relationship. When we lift up women, we lift up families, economy," Doug said.
summary: " To me it's the right thing to do -- support women -- it's mutual with Kamala, we support each other, we have each other's back. I have said many times that when we lift up women whether it's pay equity, childcare, family leave and all these issues...women should not have less rights. That's not the American way. It's also not like that if some women succeed, some dudes there are suffering. It's not one-to-one relationship. When we lift up women, we lift up families, economy," Doug said.

title: 'Creep' Mohamed Al-Fayed's indecent proposal left Princess Diana shaking, reveals butler
content: ​​“I was in the car when she (Princess Diana) came running out from his office shaking and told me, and these are her exact words, that he said, ‘I want you to marry my son because in Egyptian tradition, the father goes first’," Burrell said. "Can you imagine making love to Yoda?" Diana told Burrell. “Diana was repulsed by the thought of having to surrender to him. By making that comment, he was setting the stage for that encounter and he was serious."
summary: ​​“I was in the car when she (Princess Diana) came running out from his office shaking and told me, and these are her exact words, that he said, ‘I want you to marry my son because in Egyptian tradition, the father goes first’," Burrell said. "Can you imagine making love to Yoda?" Diana told Burrell. “Diana was repulsed by the thought of having to surrender to him. By making that comment, he was setting the stage for that encounter and he was serious."

title: Over 90,000 Georgia residents sheltering a day after chemical plant fire sent chlorine into the air
content: More than 90,000 residents near Conyers, Georgia, were told to shelter in place after a fire at the BioLab chemical plant released harmful chlorine into the air. The fire, caused by a malfunctioning sprinkler head, was brought under control, and no injuries were reported. Interstate 20 has reopened.
summary: More than 90,000 residents near Conyers, Georgia, were told to shelter in place after a fire at the BioLab chemical plant released harmful chlorine into the air. The fire, caused by a malfunctioning sprinkler head, was brought under control, and no injuries were reported. Interstate 20 has reopened.

title: 'Purge'? Why Donald Trump's latest plan of 'one rough day' to end crime draws flak
content: ​In MSNBC's Morning Joe, the anchor suggested that Trump did suggest an hour of violence. "He did suggest there should be an hour of violence, which sounds like the plot of 'The Purge,' which is deeply dangerous. We know how his words have inspired violence before, including but not limited to January 6," Jonathan Lemire said. "His followers are hearing what he's saying," Lemire added.
summary: ​In MSNBC's Morning Joe, the anchor suggested that Trump did suggest an hour of violence. "He did suggest there should be an hour of violence, which sounds like the plot of 'The Purge,' which is deeply dangerous. We know how his words have inspired violence before, including but not limited to January 6," Jonathan Lemire said. "His followers are hearing what he's saying," Lemire added.

title: Donald Trump finds a fly on stage. Social media users say his reaction is not normal
content: ​MSNBC host and legal analyst Katie Phang said Trump's reaction to the fly was not normal. "Trump is exhausted and struggling to stay on track. He begins a story about a hat, but gets distracted by a fly and never finishes. He starts a entirely new story and struggles with the word "unique"," X handle American Bridge 21st Century posted.
summary: ​MSNBC host and legal analyst Katie Phang said Trump's reaction to the fly was not normal. "Trump is exhausted and struggling to stay on track. He begins a story about a hat, but gets distracted by a fly and never finishes. He starts a entirely new story and struggles with the word "unique"," X handle American Bridge 21st Century posted.

title: 193 dead, several missing after heavy rainfall triggers floods in Nepal; Top developments
content: Nepal's floods and landslides have resulted in 193 deaths, with many still missing. Southern Kathmandu is among the worst-hit areas. Authorities are intensifying rescue efforts and constructing temporary shelters for displaced residents. Northern Bangladesh also faces severe flooding, impacting thousands due to rising water levels.
summary: Nepal's floods and landslides have resulted in 193 deaths, with many still missing. Southern Kathmandu is among the worst-hit areas. Authorities are intensifying rescue efforts and constructing temporary shelters for displaced residents. Northern Bangladesh also faces severe flooding, impacting thousands due to rising water levels.

title: UAE condemns 'heinous' attack on ambassador's home in Sudan
content: The UAE has condemned an attack on its ambassador's residence in Sudan, blaming the Sudanese army for extensive damage. The army denied targeting diplomatic missions and accused the RSF of such actions. Heavy clashes continue in Khartoum as both sides trade accusations. The UAE denies supporting the RSF, emphasizing its humanitarian efforts.
summary: The UAE has condemned an attack on its ambassador's residence in Sudan, blaming the Sudanese army for extensive damage. The army denied targeting diplomatic missions and accused the RSF of such actions. Heavy clashes continue in Khartoum as both sides trade accusations. The UAE denies supporting the RSF, emphasizing its humanitarian efforts.

title: Nepal begins damage assessment as devastating floods claim 192 lives
content: Nepal is currently assessing the damage from devastating floods and landslides that resulted in 200 deaths and left 32 people missing. Triggered by a low-pressure system in the Bay of Bengal, heavy rains severely affected Kathmandu Valley and northern Bangladesh. Experts blame poor urban planning and climate change for worsening the disaster's impact.
summary: Nepal is currently assessing the damage from devastating floods and landslides that resulted in 200 deaths and left 32 people missing. Triggered by a low-pressure system in the Bay of Bengal, heavy rains severely affected Kathmandu Valley and northern Bangladesh. Experts blame poor urban planning and climate change for worsening the disaster's impact.

title: Nepal's urban poor count cost of 'nightmare' floods
content: Floods in Kathmandu have severely impacted the city's poorest residents, with the Bagmati river overflowing due to heavy rains. Nearly 200 people were killed, and many remain missing. Rescue teams are working tirelessly to clear debris and provide relief. Experts attribute the increasing frequency and severity of such events to climate change.
summary: Floods in Kathmandu have severely impacted the city's poorest residents, with the Bagmati river overflowing due to heavy rains. Nearly 200 people were killed, and many remain missing. Rescue teams are working tirelessly to clear debris and provide relief. Experts attribute the increasing frequency and severity of such events to climate change.

title: Iran executes two men in public over deadly armed robbery
content: Shigeru Ishiba, recently elected as the leader of Japan's Liberal Democratic Party, intends to call a parliamentary election on Oct. 27 after assuming the role of prime minister. He focuses on reinforcing national security and continuing economic policies while tackling issues like declining birthrate. Key defense experts are anticipated in his Cabinet.
summary: Shigeru Ishiba, recently elected as the leader of Japan's Liberal Democratic Party, intends to call a parliamentary election on Oct. 27 after assuming the role of prime minister. He focuses on reinforcing national security and continuing economic policies while tackling issues like declining birthrate. Key defense experts are anticipated in his Cabinet.

title: EU to continue China electric vehicle talks even after final vote, say sources
content: The European Commission intends to keep negotiating with China over electric vehicle tariffs even after EU nations vote on final import duties this Friday. Proposed tariffs range from 7.8 per cent to 35.3 per cent, depending on company cooperation, and would be in addition to the standard 10% car import duty.
summary: The European Commission intends to keep negotiating with China over electric vehicle tariffs even after EU nations vote on final import duties this Friday. Proposed tariffs range from 7.8 per cent to 35.3 per cent, depending on company cooperation, and would be in addition to the standard 10% car import duty.
